comments:
I20051130-1215

Steps to reproduce:
- Create a new Java project
- Open "Build Path -> Link Source..." in Package Explorer context menu
- Browse for a folder outside the workspace
-> NPE

I can't reproduce this... are you using precisely I20051130-1215 or self hosting with a different JDT?
What kind of folder outside the workspace did you browse to?  Was it empty, containing Java source, etc?  Any more details you can give?

I am using I20051130-1215 without any other plugin versions. 

I created a simple Java project, and tried to link some source into the project. The folder containing the source contains one simple Java file and is located on my desktop. The path to the desktop folder contains spaces (I am running on XP), and my eclipse workspace directory does too.

I tested it with a folder c:\test as well and the same error occurs, no matter what the contents of the folder are.

I try with a fresh workspace
Can't reproduce with a fresh workspace. Something must be inconsistent with my selfhosting workspace. Event relaunching does not work.
Not reproducible. It sounds like your workspace was in a corrupt state (possibly due to bug 118606 which occurred in the previous build.
